text: Ziarat is a town located in lower Chitral District, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Province of Pakistan. Its coordinates are 35° 40' 26" North, 71° 55' 28" East. ==Educational institutions== *Govt Higher Secondary School ==Related pages== *Laspur *Orghoch *Gahirat ==References== Category:Union councils of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Chitral District
title: Ziarat, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
